channel.title: eval on 良宏
channel.description: Recent content in eval on 良宏

item.title: Eval PHP
item.description: 一 php后门木马常用的函数大致上可分为四种类型： 执行系统命令: system, passthru, shell_exec, exec, popen, proc_open 代码执行与加密: eval, assert, call_user_func,base64_decode, gzinflate, gzuncompress, gzdecode, str_rot13 文件包含与生成: require, require_once, include, include_once, file_get_contents, file_put_contents, fputs, fwrite .htaccess: SetHandler,
